txt.en: You must place a delving emerald into the fissure in the delving stone. This will unlock the potency trapped within the gemstone and unleash it upon the world.
A malice spread from within the gemstone you affixed to the delving stone. You must defeat the enemies to rid the evil from the world.
Having completed the mission with the malice affecting the denizens within, you should now make your way back to a mission giver who knows about delvings, and tell them of your success.
Without a delving emerald you cannot unlock the greater strength of the enemies in this space.
Speak with a mission giver who knows about delvings

'Again you return to me victorious, [placeholder]. This habitual destruction of evil is a boon to the Free Peoples and we are lucky to count you among our number. Here -- take this for your efforts and take this if you should like to further your growing legend.'
You left the instance and failed the delving
A dire malice spreads through the area...
Find and open the final chest within the space
Delving deeply into the world, the forces of the enemy are more powerful and vicious.
The stone is inert. There is a clear fissure in the surface where one, with a little effort, could affix a gem of some sort. Perhaps you have such a gem in your possession.
Find and open the final chest within the space
A dire malice spreads through the area...

The delving emerald fits into the fissure within the delving stone. The emerald cracks and the darkness within creeps out of the stone and moves into the air as a black tendril. A flash of dread fills you, but passes.
Affix the delving emerald to the delving stone ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
